identified-content.person: BACKUS, JILLIAN COURTNEY HUBBARD (JILLIAN COURTNEY HUBBARD SULLIVAN)

block.p: Jillian Courtney Hubbard Backus, a daughter of Theresa Backus and Dennis L. Backus of Mill Neck, N.Y., was married yesterday to Dr. Brendan Patrick Sullivan, a son of Gene Sullivan and Dr. Gregory Sullivan of Upper Montclair, N.J. The Rev. Paul E. Gilbert performed the ceremony at St. John's of Lattingtown Episcopal Church in Locust Valley, N.Y.

Mrs. Sullivan, 28, creates digital special effects in New York for Discreet, which develops computer software for feature films and broadcast graphics. She graduated from the University of Southern California. Her father is an environmental consultant in Oyster Bay, N.Y. Her mother is a guidance counselor at La Salle Military Academy in Oakdale, N.Y.

Jillian Courtney Hubbard Backus, a daughter of Theresa Backus and Dennis L. Backus of Mill Neck, N.Y., was married yesterday to Dr. Brendan Patrick Sullivan, a son of Gene Sullivan and Dr. Gregory Sullivan of Upper Montclair, N.J. The Rev. Paul E. Gilbert performed the ceremony at St. John's of Lattingtown Episcopal Church in Locust Valley, N.Y.

Mrs. Sullivan, 28, creates digital special effects in New York for Discreet, which develops computer software for feature films and broadcast graphics. She graduated from the University of Southern California. Her father is an environmental consultant in Oyster Bay, N.Y. Her mother is a guidance counselor at La Salle Military Academy in Oakdale, N.Y.

Dr. Sullivan, 32, is a resident in internal medicine at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital in New York. He graduated from Georgetown University, from which he also received a master's degree in physiology, and received his M.D. from St. George's University in Grenada. His mother owns Ivory Bird Antiques in Montclair. His father is a cardiologist in Clifton, N.J.
